entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pangnirtung
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 70%
